definition: many/much/often/a lot of/numerous/more/in excess/how (to what extent)/multi-/Taiwan pr. [duo2] when it means "how"
system/to control/to regulate/variant of 製|制[zhi4]

sentences.english: The polls were Sudan's first multi-party elections in 24 years.
sentences.chinese: 本次民意調查是蘇丹24年內第一次多黨制選舉。

sentences.english: Calls for a multiparty democracy remain taboo, but not much else.
sentences.chinese: 呼籲多黨制民主仍然是禁忌，但別的就沒什麼了。
